label: 仏法
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: the Buddhist law. Often used in opposition to ōbō, or the king’s (secular) law. Both were supposed to work together for a well-governed state.
